lead_paragraph: TNT, the Dutch delivery group, said on Monday that it was on track for the separation of its mail and express units by Jan. 1, as the company reported that third-quarter net profit fell by a fifth despite higher revenues.
snippet: TNT, the Dutch logistics group, said Monday that it was on track for the separation of its mail and express unit by January 1, as the company reported that its third-quarter net profit fell by a fifth despite higher revenues.

headline.main: TNT Says Split Is on Track as Profit Declines

abstract: TNT, the Dutch logistics group, said Monday that it was on track for the separation of its mail and express unit by January 1, as the company reported that its third-quarter net profit fell by a fifth despite higher revenues.
